fields.label: ALERT
fields.message: This area is currently under construction and is for testing purposes only.

fields.label: Font Embed code
fields.name: font_embed_code
fields.instructions:
create a google font family or a typekit and paste the entire embed code here.
Example: 
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Do+Hyeon|Roboto:300,400,700" rel="stylesheet">

sub_fields.label: Title of section
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this section (this is what appears in the tabs and as the headline above the section)

sub_fields.label: Title of section
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this section (this is what appears in the tabs and as the headline above the section)

sub_fields.label: Font Name
sub_fields.name: font_name
sub_fields.instructions:
This will be the pretty name for display
(eg. Roboto)

sub_fields.label: Font Selector
sub_fields.name: font_selector
sub_fields.instructions:
Input the css rules provided when generating the google font family or typekit. It will look something like this :

'Roboto', sans-serif

sub_fields.label: Font Weight
sub_fields.name: font_weight
sub_fields.instructions: Only include weights that have been included in the embed code. (google font or typekit) If left blank will use default style

sub_fields.label: Font Color
sub_fields.name: font_hexcode
sub_fields.instructions: If you leave this blank color will be determined by stylesheet.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: leave blank if you don't need

sub_fields.label: Title of section
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this section (this is what appears in the tabs and as the headline above the section)

sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: (include the animation style name from codepen https://codepen.io/ggdigitalteam/pen/eKYrZW)
sub_fields.default_value: On white background - Fade in Fill
